page.title: 12BRIDLE PATHS NEAR MALBOROUGH
page.content: {The Thurlestone Ridge Path Our best bridle path is the ridge which runs from{Thurlestone}to{South {Milton}and to{South Huish}.We have a great game down the path .It is usually me, Sarah, on Zaida my pony who stays behind , and Jenny on her pony Dodger goes and hides in a gate way . I come charging up the hill and Jenny jumps out and gallops after me going,{"Wo!Wo!Wo!",}and {"Aaaaaaaa! {Aaaaaaa!"}, until we get to the end of the lane .{ {The Hope Cove Ridge Path} Jenny and I also like this path. It starts at{Hope Cove }and ends at { {Galmpton}. At the start you have to go very carefully because there is a cliff. When we get on the lane and start cantering , we break into a gallop and pretend to hunt.It's great fun.
